In the evening, I attended "Roundtable on Social Responsibility". It is a new framework that economic organizations, consumer groups, labor unions, NPOs, etc. cooperate in solving problems against social issues such as environment, welfare and education. I also participated as representative of the administration. I expect it as one of the places to realize "new public".

With regret I inform you that the gas platform Aban Pearl sank a few moments ago. The good news is that the 95 workers are safe.
They were evacuated and at the moment two patrolmen from our Navy are moving to the area. We will move on and we WILL OVERCOME. VivaVENEZUELA !!!
